abstract: Jon Huntsman has effectively warned against the perils of "too big to fail," and in terms his Republican colleagues must respond to, an economist writes.
snippet: Jon Huntsman has effectively warned against the perils of "too big to fail," and in terms his Republican colleagues must respond to, an economist writes.
lead_paragraph: Simon Johnson, the former chief economist at the International Monetary Fund, is the co-author of "13 Bankers."

headline.main: Huntsman's Warning on 'Too Big to Fail'
